item.title: States Weekly: February 18, 2026
item.description: This edition of States Weekly covers February 18, 2026.

item.title: Transnistria: A Conflict Unfrozen but Not Thawed
item.description: For the first time in three decades, there is clear and significant momentum toward Transnistrian reintegration, but converting this moment into a permanent solution requires vision, substantial financial resources, and delicate diplomacy.
